If 手 = (6,6) JJ (2，3)

 Find the distance between points 手(6, 6) and 賓周 (2, 3)

JJ=√(6 – 2)² + (6 – 3)²

JJ=√(4)² + (3)²

JJ=√16 + 3

JJ=√25

JJ = 5cm
